Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it's worth more than $12000 to us. Considering the value it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $15000. This is an exceptional chance to secure a piece that could potentially increase in value over time and serve as a significant addition to your collection or business. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
